nodes.text: The Duros Allied Army was a military unit during the Galactic Civil War. At her debutante cotillion, Rivoche Tarkin learned of a planned CompForce attack against the Duros Allied Army from a cadet. She passed the information on to an Academy cadet that she knew had "questionable" friends—Biggs Darklighter. The CompForce assault on the Duros Allied Army failed, and Rivoche Tarkin began her career as a spy for the Alliance.
